slots.hook: The developer portal is waiting. It's pinned warm for a reason — once you get it running locally, you can start connecting communication and platform info for the team. Getting past this setup hurdle unlocks the real work.
slots.next_step: Open the Cerebro repo and locate the README or setup documentation

slots.hook: Saturday is Dana's 30th — laser tag, drinks, and yellow Jell-O shots with the crew. You've got the gift sorted, but you still need that Jell-O shot recipe to make it happen. Two days out, this is the moment to lock it down.
slots.next_step: Search for a yellow Jell-O shot recipe online

slots.hook: Mariano turns 30 in 15 days and you're planning a warm backpacking weekend before Chicago. Flights to Chicago are booked, but the backpacking destination is still wide open. Finding that spot unlocks everything else — gear, flights, the whole adventure.
slots.next_step: Open a search for warm backpacking destinations accessible mid-March
